DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective review will evaluate the efficacy of Valcyte (valganciclovir) in preventing Cytomegalovirus (CMV) disease in D+/R- liver transplant recipients. Data from eligible patients will be collected for the 6 months following transplantation.
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study of Valcyte (Valganciclovir) in D+/R- Liver Transplant Recipients
DOC.criteria: Liver transplant recipients, >/= 16 years of age Transplantation between January 2004 and June 2009 CMV seronegative recipient (R) who received a liver transplant from a seropositive donor (D+) Valganciclovir therapy for at least 70 days beginning within 10 days post transplantation Assessment of CMV disease status within the first 6 months post transplantation
